layout.singingstanza: In -- vis -- i -- ble, God is in -- vis -- i -- ble! In -- vis -- i -- ble, yes, He's in -- vis -- i -- ble! No man has ev -- er seen Him Or ev -- er could! For He's in -- vis -- i -- ble, God is in -- vis -- i -- ble. So pow -- er -- ful, God is pow -- er -- ful! All cre -- a -- tion shows us He's so pow -- er -- ful! Al -- though we can't see God, We can see what He's made! He's in -- vis -- i -- ble and pow -- er -- ful!

lyrics.stanza: Invisible, God is invisible! Invisible, yes, He's invisible! No man has ever seen Him Or ever could! For He's invisible, God is invisible.
So powerful, God is powerful! All creation shows us He's so powerful! Although we can't see God, We can see what He's made! He's invisible and powerful!
